44.eng-name: The Book of the Merits of the Companions
44.ara-name: كتاب فضائل الصحابة رضى الله تعالى عنهم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar reported Umar as saying:My lord concorded with (my judgments) on three occasions. In case of the Station of Ibrahim, in case of the observance of veil and in case of the prisoners of Badr

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ فَضَائِلِ عُمَرَ رضى الله تعالى عنه
